subtitle: An exotic and filling salad that is a marvellous accompaniment for barbecues.

method.text: In a large pan, cook the rice in boiling water for 25 min or until just tender. Drain well and rinse under cold water to cool. Drain very well again. Place into a large mixing bowl.
Mix the rice, mango, sharon fruit, salad onions, sunflower and pumpkin seeds and cashew nuts together.
In a screw-top jar, combine the dressing ingredients and shake until thoroughly mixed. Stir the dressing into the rice mixture until evenly coated.
Transfer the salad to a serving bowl. Serve chilled.

title: Tropical spicy rice salad
